entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 9:10 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.7°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: S 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
